    • scheduleSyncRepeatingTask

      public static int scheduleSyncRepeatingTask​(Runnable task, long delay, long repeat)
      Accepts a Runnable object with a delay/repeat (-1 for no delay)
      Parameters:
      task - runnable object
      delay - ticks to delay starting (Long)
      repeat - ticks to repeat after (Long)
      Returns:
      -1 if unable to schedule or an index to the task is successful.

    • getMaterial

      @Deprecated public static org.bukkit.Material getMaterial​(int id)
      Deprecated.
      Find a Material from an Id. Helpfully using Phoenix616's useful IdConverter.jar https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/id-converter.52099/
      Parameters:
      id - - ID for a material (Integer)
      Returns:
      a Material parsed from IdMappings

      public static int calcChunk​(int value)
      Accepts an X or Z value and returns the associated Towny plot value.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      int of the relevant townblock x/z.
